io.delta.kernel.client

Interface JsonHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FileHandler

    public interface JsonHandler
extends FileHandler
    Provides JSON handling functionality to Delta Kernel. Delta Kernel can use this client to parse JSON strings into Row. Connectors can leverage this interface to provide their best implementation of the JSON parsing capability to Delta Kernel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColumnarBatch parseJson(ColumnVector jsonStringVector, StructType outputSchema)
      Parse the given json string and return the requested fields in given outputSchema as a Row.
      CloseableIterator<FileDataReadResult> readJsonFiles(CloseableIterator<FileReadContext> fileIter, StructType physicalSchema)
      Read the JSON format file at given location and return the data.

      • Methods inherited from interface io.delta.kernel.client.FileHandler

        contextualizeFileReads

    • Method Detail

      • parseJson

        ColumnarBatch parseJson(ColumnVector jsonStringVector,
                        StructType outputSchema)
        Parse the given json string and return the requested fields in given outputSchema as a Row.
        Parameters:
        jsonStringVector - Valid JSON object in string format.
        outputSchema - Schema of the data to return from the parse JSON. If any requested fields are missing in the JSON string, a null is returned for that particular field in returned Row. The type for each given field is expected to match the type in JSON.
        Returns:
        ColumnarBatch with one row for each entry is the input column vector with outputSchema

      • readJsonFiles

        CloseableIterator<FileDataReadResult> readJsonFiles(CloseableIterator<FileReadContext> fileIter,
                                                    StructType physicalSchema)
                                             throws java.io.IOException
        Read the JSON format file at given location and return the data.
        Parameters:
        fileIter - Iterator of FileReadContext objects to read data from.
        physicalSchema - Select list of columns to read from the JSON file.
        Returns:
        an iterator of data in columnar format. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the iterator. The data returned is in the same as the order of files given in fileIter.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs during the read.
